searchPlaceholder: Search for a menu by title or description
description: This form allows you to create a new weekly menu that can be assigned to the current week. Enter the menu title (required), a brief description (optional), and, if necessary, select dietary restrictions. Once the menu is created, you can start planning and managing the weekly meal plan.
editFormDescription: This form allows you to edit weekly menu data. Enter new data if needed and save changes.
noWeeklyMenuTitle: No menus created – add your first weekly menu and start planning!
noWeeklyMenuDescription: To start planning your weekly menu, click the “Create First Menu” button, enter a title, description, and select dietary restrictions (optional).
activeMenuStatusExplanation: This weekly menu is currently active, meaning it is associated with the current week and being used. Meals from this menu are linked to the ongoing week.
inactiveMenuStatusExplanation: This weekly menu is not assigned to any current week or was used in a past week, therefore its status is marked as inactive. The status of the weekly menu will automatically update when it is assigned to a specific week's plan.
archivedMenuStatusExplanation: This weekly menu is archived and cannot be used for any week. To use it again, you need to unarchive it first.

validation.titleRequired: Title is required and must be unique
validation.titleLength: Title must be between 3 and 70 characters
validation.descriptionLength: Description must be less than 200 characters
validation.customDescriptionLength: Description must be less than {{count}} characters

removeMealFromDay: Remove meal from this day can be effect your weekly menu. Are you sure you want to remove this meal from this day?
deleteWeeklyMenuDescription: Are you sure you want to delete this weekly menu? This action cannot be undone.
archiveWeeklyMenuModalDescription: Are you sure you want to archive this weekly menu? This action cannot be undone.
unarchiveWeeklyMenuModalDescription: Are you sure you want to unarchive this weekly menu? This action cannot be undone.
notFoundCurrentWeeklyMenuByIdData: Weekly menu not found by ID
notFoundCurrentWeeklyMenuByIdDescription: The weekly menu you are trying to access does not exist or has been deleted.
noMealsAssignedTitle: No meals assigned for this day
noMealsAssignedDescription: To assign meals to this day, click the “Assign Meal” button and select the meal you want to add to this day.
searchMealsFromDatabaseAndAssign: Search for a meals in the database and assign them to this day.
noResultsDescription: No weekly menu match your search and filters. Try adjusting your search or filters.
